title: login-session
description: Get localStorage, sessionStorage and cookies from logins for usage in other actors

username.title: Your username
username.description: The username/email that will be passed to the form

password.title: Your password
password.description: The password that will be passed to the form

userAgent.title: Browser User Agent
userAgent.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.122 Safari/537.36
userAgent.prefill: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.122 Safari/537.36
userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.122 Safari/537.36

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: How many retries before considering the request as failed

website.title: Website to grab a session from
website.description: The website to get the session from. The login form should be available on the provided url

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: Each step that should be taken for the login to happen. For multi-stage logins (username then password), provide multiple steps

cookieDomains.title: Cookie domains
cookieDomains.description: Specify the domains that should get cookies from

gotoTimeout.title: Visit page timeout
gotoTimeout.description: How many seconds until page.goto should wait

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by your actor.

extraUrlPatterns.title: Extra url blocking patterns
extraUrlPatterns.description: Passes this blocking pattern to puppeteer.blockRequests, so you can selectively block some requests on the page

forceCloud.title: Force cloud
forceCloud.description: Use this when you execute the actor locally in your machine, but fills the session storage on the Apify platform
